info.title: System Initiative API
info.description: The API Server for interacting with a System Initiative workspace

412.description: Precondition Failed - View not found or duplicate function name
Precondition Failed - View not found or duplicate function name

200.description: Change set merge status retrieved successfully

412.description: Schema variant not found for schema

ActionReference.description:
Reference to a management function by either name or ID.
This allows clients to use the more human-friendly name approach
or the more precise ID approach when working with actions.

ApiError.description: Standard error response format for v1 API

ApiSuccess_String.description: Standard success response format for v1 API

DomainPropPath.description: A prop path, starting from root/domain, with / instead of PROP_PATH_SEPARATOR as its separator

ManagementFunctionReference.description:
Reference to a management function by either name or ID.
This allows clients to use the more human-friendly name approach
or the more precise ID approach when working with management functions.

MergeStatusV1ResponseAction.description: Action item in merge status response
